main.name: Dillon Butvin
main.description: Here you'll find a collection of my work and play. Get to know me, check out my current blog, and don't hesitate to reach out!
main.bio: I have a background in Engineering, Operations, Customer Service, Sales, and Optimism. I constantly strive to better myself and enable those around me to do the same. I'm a pleasant person to be around, be succeeding with, and be in the trenches with. No project too big, no task too small. If it gets us where we're going, I'll finish them all.
main.contactmessage: Please reach out with any questions, desires to hire, or if you just want to say hello!

testimonials.text: Working with Dillon Butvin was a great experience. He is highly motivated, self-driven, and a fantastic leader. His background working in the startup environment proved to be critically valuable to Second Act. Additionally, his leadership ability helped motivate team members to meet their deadlines and goals. Dillon will be a valuable resource in his future teams.
